Author: lazyobsessive
Text: I just puked 3 times in the span of 3 hours. I kept trying to make food and actually keep it down, but I just couldnâ€™t do it. I spent 90 minutes obsessively gulping down water and then making myself vomit it back up. yay... an amazing way to end an amazing year...  I know how you are feeling tonight, my dog just laid down next to me whilst I was throwing up and crying into the toilet, looking at me with those adorable eyes.   Please try and be kind to yourself for the rest of the night. I am putting on a face mask and burring myself under a copious number of blankets, the warmth is really comforting.   Here is to being alone on New Years eve and to hoping that the 2020s will be a much better decade  :).
